name: Snake Ballet
description:
An ever-growing army of botanic baddies! 

Take control of Mei, a young girl who simply wanted to enjoy her time in the forest, until the trees around her started to grow in size, sprout out of the ground, and even become sentient! These autumn oaks are on the attack, and you must jump, spin, and hack at this threat with your newfound axe, searching for just what, or who, could’ve caused this madness…?

credits:
